reg_pit.acttitle: Employment and Assistance Act and Employment and Assistance for Persons with Disabilities Act
reg_pit.title: Forms Regulation

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 265/2019, effective January 1, 2020.

reg:regulation.reg:acttitle:
Employment and Assistance Act and
Employment and Assistance for Persons with Disabilities Act
reg:regulation.reg:title: Forms Regulation

bcl:section.bcl:text: The attached monthly report form is prescribed for the purposes of the Employment and Assistance Act and the Employment and Assistance for Persons with Disabilities Act.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Employment and Assistance Act, S.B.C. 2002, c. 40, s. 33 (3); Employment and Assistance for Persons with Disabilities Act, S.B.C. 2002, c. 41, s. 24 (3)]
